question: The MoU on solid waste management, Spatial planning, water management, smart cities is extended till 2024 between Uttar Pradesh and which of the following countries?
explanation: The MoU on solid waste management, Spatial planning, water management, smart cities is extended till 2024 between Uttar Pradesh and the Netherlands. Netherlands ambassador to India, Marten vand den Berg signed this MoU with officials of Uttar Pradesh.
